ygData.subject: Re: Which song for soloing?
ygData.msgSnippet: Eh, John... how do you do the macro inventory changing thing?  That d be a big time help for me :) Thanks, Tigsen DarkMoon 10th lvl bard on Innoruuk ...
ygData.messageBody:
Eh, John... how do you do the macro inventory changing thing? That'd
be a big time help for me :)

Thanks,
Tigsen DarkMoon
10th lvl bard on Innoruuk

> From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
> And it helps if you switch to a drum or lute
> before you run. (Does everyone on this list know about

> weapons/instruments without having to open your inventory?)
>
